name: Battle for Wesnoth
description: Battle for Wesnoth is a turn-based strategy game. The game includes race system, unit system, terrain system, circadian system, experience system and a very complete operation and friendly help system. Players around the world can play offline and online games with each other.

en_US.description: Battle for Wesnoth is a turn-based strategy game. The game includes race system, unit system, terrain system, circadian system, experience system and a very complete operation and friendly help system. Players around the world can play offline and online games with each other.
en_US.name: Battle for Wesnoth

zh_CN.description: 韦诺之战是一个回合制策略游戏。游戏包括种族系统、单位系统、地形系统、昼夜系统、经验系统以及一套非常完善友好的操作与帮助系统。玩家可以进行单机战役或通过联机与全世界玩家进行在线游戏。
zh_CN.name: 韦诺之战
